lead_paragraph: Andrew Livingston, the majority owner of Knickerbocker Mfg. Co., a clothing company, lives in Williamsburg in a converted church.
snippet: Andrew Livingston, the majority owner of Knickerbocker Mfg. Co., a clothing company, lives in Williamsburg in a converted church.

headline.main: A Fashion Entrepreneur at Home in Brooklyn

abstract: Fashion entrepreneur Andrew Livingston loves his two-bedroom duplex in converted Catholic Church in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, where he displays photos of iconic American men and various carefully curated vintage object collections.
